availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas Kemp Goodloe (Hopkins County, Ky, farmer )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Clark County, Kentucky, native. Married to Diana Dunkeson Goodloe in Christian County, Kentucky, on December 5, 1827. Father of Sarah Goodloe. Married to Nancy Small Goodloe in Daviess County on September 8, 1859. Resident of Hopkins County in 1850. Owned five enslaved persons in Hopkins County in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860. Owned six enslaved persons in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Christian County Marriages, Film #000465562, p. 89.
